metadata.title: CVE-2021-33928 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in function pool_installable in src/repo.h inlibsolv before 0.7.17 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: libsolv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
